about_the_game:
ABOUT THE CONTENTS

You can access the 'Young Wife's Dilemma' story from 'Obedient Women'.

Young Wife's Dilemma

HEROINE:
Kaede Kagami
A bored housewife who doesn't have any hobbies has pent-up frustration because of the sexless marriage with her husband.

SYNOPSIS (Young Wife's Dilemma)


A young wife with the dichotomy of purity and carnal hunger.
She's a demure wife with a good reputation.
Her cooking is particularly awesome and her husband's colleagues envy him.
People always said she was cute when she was a student, but gradually her glamorous body has become even sexier as she's aged.
Her husband is always very busy and she's bored because she doesn't have any hobbies.
They don't have sex very much, so she releases her frustration by masturbating.
However, she can't ask him to have sex because she's very introverted.
But, even the masturbation can't satisfy her level of pent-up frustration.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game product contains sexual content and is intended for adults only.
It contains images and descriptions of adult nudity and sexual behavior.
The contents of this game are inappropriate for minors and perhaps not suitable for the workplace.
All characters involved in any sexual situations in this game are intended to be over 18 years of age.
Some non-consensual sexual activity is included.
This is a work of fiction.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 128MB, Resolution 720p
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card and latest driver
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 512MB, Resolution 1080p
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card and latest driver
